message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000. This is a great deal, as the product is worth at least $800000 to you. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to a more mutually beneficial agreement. Given the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still looking for a bit more.  I'm willing to come down to $875000.  Let's see if we can close this deal.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price closer to your last proposal. I would like to counter with an offer of $860000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
